about_the_game:
Lawless Lands

The Blood Pit DLC for Lawless Lands adds a fighting arena where you can fight against foes in high-stake battles to the death!

Blood Pit DLC:
  • New Discoverable Location - The Blood Pit, a combat arena where you can earn gold, fame, and hone your skills against a variety of enemies
  • New Vendors and Characters - Meet a small group of new characters who run the Blood Pit and gain access to their shops and services near the pit
  • Training Sword - A weak but valuable tool, it will help you and your companions earn experience quicker
  • 17 Different Fights - There are 17 possible fights that you can be offered which are replayable and randomized to keep you on your toes
  • New Unique Title "Gladiator"
  • 1 Training Sword added to your strongbox
  • 10 Fame added to your strongbox - Fame is a resource like any other and represents your reputation. It influences how likely you can attract followers and affect people's hearts
  • 15 Scrap added to your strongbox - Used for repairing and maintaining your equipment after battle without needing the help of a blacksmith
  • 1 Repair Hammer added to your strongbox - Used with scrap, this allows you to repair your equipment by yourself

PLEASE NOTE: IN ORDER TO RECEIVE THE ITEMS FROM THIS PACK, YOU MUST FIRST TALK TO HUSTAN IN THE PYRSHEN HOSPITAL TO ACTIVATE THE DLC! THEN, YOU CAN TRAVEL TO THE DESERT IN THE SOUTHWEST AND DISCOVER THE NEW LOCATION. YOU CAN ACTIVATE THIS ANYTIME YOU WISH! YOU DO NOT NEED TO START A NEW GAME!
